## snoise2 variable

Array and textureless GLSL 2D simplex noise function. Ported from original GLSL implementation by Ian McEwan &amp; Ashima Arts.

[https://github.com/ashima/webgl-noise](https://github.com/ashima/webgl-noise)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
snoise2: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").TaggedFn1<"vec2", "float">
```
